org.gvsig.raster.fmap.layers

Interface FLyrRaster

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable, DynObject, ExtendedPropertiesSupport, FLayer, Metadata, Persistent, Projected
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFLyrRaster, FLyrBingMaps, FLyrGoogleMaps, FLyrOSM, FLyrWCS, FLyrWMS, FLyrWMTS

    public interface FLyrRaster
extends FLayer
    All kind of raster layers should implement this interface.

          double scale)
   throws ReadException
        Description copied from interface: FLayer
        Draws the layer using a buffer.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface FLayer
        Parameters:
        image - an image used to accelerate the screen draw
        g - for rendering 2-dimensional shapes, text and images on the Java(tm) platform
        vp - information for drawing this layer

        scale - value that represents the scale
